SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[PasswordmanagerCategorie] ( [PasswordmanagerCategorie_Ky] int IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL , [PasswordmanagerCategorie_Titolo] varchar(200) NULL , [PasswordmanagerCategorie_Icona] varchar(200) NULL , [PasswordmanagerCategorie_UserInsert] int NULL , [PasswordmanagerCategorie_UserUpdate] int NULL , [PasswordmanagerCategorie_UserDelete] int NULL , [PasswordmanagerCategorie_DateInsert] datetime NULL , [PasswordmanagerCategorie_DateUpdate] datetime NULL , [PasswordmanagerCategorie_DateDelete] datetime NULL ) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[PasswordmanagerCategorie] ADD CONSTRAINT PK_PasswordmanagerCategorie PRIMARY KEY ([PasswordmanagerCategorie_Ky])
